Html:
Hello,

I am the coordinator of the Sofa project: We wrapped the AvalonDock docking library to add new features and enhance existing one.

In order to validate the project usability we use Sofa to change "classical" applications into ""Visual Studio like" applications. This has been done for HAP Explorer. You can find it in the Sofa Additional Examples.

Comments are welcome ...
As an addition to my previous post: May be this simple example can be the base for a "HAP studio": Post a reply if you have HAP based tools/utilities that can usefully be integrated in the example.
I really like the addition of the source view in the top left panel. Makes it easier to navigate the nodes. Also the look and feel is great. Nice work!
